name: THE 2048
description: THE 2048 is a fun, simple and very addictive game. You need to combine tiles with numbers to reach the number 2048! Break your brain and be happy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1.2 Ghz and up Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core Duo 1.5 Ghz and up Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics Storage: 50 MB available space
